chapters.title: Chapter 37: The Last Battle
chapters.info: Juilin Sandar, p. 698—Thief-taker from Tear, one of the best at his craft. ` He is short, and has taken to wearing a flat-topped, conical hat. He accompanied Nynaeve and Elayne on their travels because Lan asked him to. He accepted partly out of respect for Lan, and partly out of guilt; he betrayed Elayne, Egwene, and Nynaeve to the Black Ajah when Liandrin used Compulsion on him, and later realized how wrong it was. He carries a notched sword-breaker and a staff with which he is deadly; he could make a Whitecloak appear relaxed. He has fallen in love with Amathera, the Panarch of Tarabon. He traveled with Mat Cauthon for a time, and is now the leader of a squad tasked with protecting the Aes Sedai from the Sharan infantry. He has no idea how he came to command troops, or why anyone would trust him to do so. See also Lounault, Amathera Aelfdene Casmir.
